title: 1867 CDV of Base Ball Player with Bat
author: ramram

posts.post_title: 1867 CDV of Base Ball Player with Bat
posts.post_content:
Early (c. 1867) ball player with typical enormous bat of the time period.  Photographer was Earle of Grand Rapids, Michigan who had a photography studio there from 1867 to 1868.  Sold 

Rob M
